greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: "Second factorials": Product_{k=1..n} k^(k^2).
reference: Spyros G. Kanellos: Mathematical Researches and Results [in Greek]. Athens, 1965.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..13
maple: A051675 := proc(n) local k; mul(k^(k^2),k=1..n); end;
program: (PARI) for(n=1, 10, print1(prod(k=1,n, k^(k^2)), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 14 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
